summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear to be implemented: the backend now checks for a list of positive/thank-you phrases case-insensitively (via `toLower()` + `contains`), and the frontend example prompt list now includes a thank-you phrase ("Thanks!"). However, the diff also introduces unrelated backend responses (electrician services, "creat" → "adoniyas") and unrelated frontend UI/branding/link-section changes that were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added unrelated backend intent/response for electrician services (Düsseldorf area).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks for keyword/phrase recognition of positive/thank-you words; no electrician-service feature was requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added unrelated backend trigger/response for input containing "creat" returning "adoniyas".
hallucinated_features.reason: Not part of requested positive/thank-you recognition or existing topic-specific responses described in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/imported and rendered an AppLinkSection and associated deployment/link UI behavior in the main chat app.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-2 only requests adding an example prompt demonstrating thank-you recognition; link/deployment section UI is not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced additional header/branding UI elements (logo/hero background imagery) and extra icon imports beyond the example prompt change.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-2; the only frontend change requested is adding at least one example prompt for the new recognition behavior.
